DOC.brief_summary: Several factor influence extension anesthetic mixture spinal anesthesia include anesthetic gravity , body position , drug volume , drug-delivering velocity . However , effect temperature anesthetic mixture cephalad sensory blockade hitherto unknown . The investigator hypothesize different temperature anesthetic mixture different velocity extension spinal anesthesia . In addition , previous study suggest parturients relative high sensitivity temperature . Herein investigator propose temperature anesthetic mixture extensive effect cephalad sensory blockade spinal anesthesia cesarean delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Anesthetic Temperature Cephalad Sensory Blockade With Spinal Anesthesia
